meanings.definition: A compound containing iodine in its -1 oxidation state.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the iodid under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The iodid was used in the experiment to test its properties.
meanings.sent3: The iodid and the other compounds had a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The iodid was like a superhero, protecting the other elements in the compound.
meanings.sent5: The vivid purple color of the iodid made it stand out in the solution.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with iodide.
meanings.sent1: The doctor iodid the patient's wound to prevent infection.
meanings.sent2: She iodid the solution to make sure it was properly mixed.
meanings.sent3: The chef iodid the dish with a sprinkle of iodine for flavor.
meanings.sent4: He iodid his speech with humor to engage the audience.
meanings.sent5: The gardener iodid the soil to ensure healthy plant growth.
